00036         class VoronoiElement2D : public PipelineElement2D
00037         {
00038                 private:
00039                         Real mFrequency;
00040                         int mSeed;
00041                         Real mDisplacement;
00042                         bool mEnableDistance;
00043 
00044                 public:
00045                         VoronoiElement2D (Real frequency, int seed, Real displacement, bool enableDistance) : mFrequency(frequency), mSeed(seed), mDisplacement(displacement), mEnableDistance(enableDistance)
00046                         {
00047                         }
00048                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const
00049                         {
00050                                 x *= mFrequency;
00051                                 y *= mFrequency;
00052 
00053                                 int xi = (x > Real(0.0) ? (int)x : (int)x - 1);
00054                                 int yi = (y > Real(0.0) ? (int)y : (int)y - 1);
00055 
00056                                 Real minDist = Real(2147483647.0);
00057                                 Real xmin = Real(0);
00058                                 Real ymin = Real(0);
00059 
00060                                 for (int xc=xi-2;xc<=xi+2;++xc)
00061                                 {
00062                                         for (int yc=yi-2;yc<=yi+2;++yc)
00063                                         {
00064                                                 Real xp = xc + Generator2D::calcNoise(xc, yc, mSeed);
00065                                                 Real yp = yc + Generator2D::calcNoise(xc, yc, mSeed+1);
00066                                                 Real xd = xp - x;
00067                                                 Real yd = yp - y;
00068                                                 Real dist = xd * xd + yd * yd;
00069                                                 if (dist < minDist)
00070                                                 {
00071                                                         minDist = dist;
00072                                                         xmin = xp;
00073                                                         ymin = yp;
00074                                                 }
00075                                         }
00076                                 }
00077 
00078                                 Real value;
00079                                 if (mEnableDistance)
00080                                 {
00081                                         const Real SQRT_TWO = 1.4142135623730951;
00082                                         Real xDist = xmin - x;
00083                                         Real yDist = ymin - y;
00084                                         value = (std::sqrt(xDist * xDist + yDist * yDist)) * SQRT_TWO - Real(1.0);
00085                                 }
00086                                 else
00087                                 {
00088                                         value = Real(0.0);
00089                                 }
00090 
00091                                 return value + (mDisplacement * (Real)Generator2D::calcNoise((int)floor(xmin), (int)floor(ymin)));
00092                         }
00093         };

00095         class VoronoiElement3D : public PipelineElement3D
00096         {
00097                 private:
00098                         Real mFrequency;
00099                         int mSeed;
00100                         Real mDisplacement;
00101                         bool mEnableDistance;
00102 
00103                 public:
00104                         VoronoiElement3D (Real frequency, int seed, Real displacement, bool enableDistance) : mFrequency(frequency), mSeed(seed), mDisplacement(displacement), mEnableDistance(enableDistance)
00105                         {
00106                         }
00107                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const
00108                         {
00109                                 x *= mFrequency;
00110                                 y *= mFrequency;
00111                                 z *= mFrequency;
00112 
00113                                 int xi = (x > Real(0.0) ? (int)x : (int)x - 1);
00114                                 int yi = (y > Real(0.0) ? (int)y : (int)y - 1);
00115                                 int zi = (z > Real(0.0) ? (int)z : (int)z - 1);
00116 
00117                                 Real minDist = Real(2147483647.0);
00118                                 Real xmin = Real(0);
00119                                 Real ymin = Real(0);
00120                                 Real zmin = Real(0);
00121 
00122                                 for (int xc=xi-2;xc<=xi+2;++xc)
00123                                 {
00124                                         for (int yc=yi-2;yc<=yi+2;++yc)
00125                                         {
00126                                                 for (int zc=zi-2;zc<=zi+2;++zc)
00127                                                 {
00128                                                         Real xp = xc + Generator3D::calcNoise(xc, yc, zc, mSeed);
00129                                                         Real yp = yc + Generator3D::calcNoise(xc, yc, zc, mSeed+1);
00130                                                         Real zp = zc + Generator3D::calcNoise(xc, yc, zc, mSeed+2);
00131                                                         Real xd = xp - x;
00132                                                         Real yd = yp - y;
00133                                                         Real zd = zp - z;
00134                                                         Real dist = xd * xd + yd * yd + zd * zd;
00135                                                         if (dist < minDist)
00136                                                         {
00137                                                                 minDist = dist;
00138                                                                 xmin = xp;
00139                                                                 ymin = yp;
00140                                                                 zmin = zp;
00141                                                         }
00142                                                 }
00143                                         }
00144                                 }
00145 
00146                                 Real value;
00147                                 if (mEnableDistance)
00148                                 {
00149                                         const Real SQRT_THREE = 1.7320508075688772;
00150                                         Real xDist = xmin - x;
00151                                         Real yDist = ymin - y;
00152                                         Real zDist = zmin - z;
00153                                         value = (std::sqrt(xDist * xDist + yDist * yDist + zDist * zDist)) * SQRT_THREE - Real(1.0);
00154                                 }
00155                                 else
00156                                 {
00157                                         value = Real(0.0);
00158                                 }
00159 
00160                                 return value + (mDisplacement * (Real)Generator3D::calcNoise((int)floor(xmin), (int)floor(ymin), (int)floor(zmin)));
00161                         }
00162         };

00167         class VoronoiModule : public Module
00168         {
00169                 protected:
00171                         Real mFrequency;
00173                         int mSeed;
00175                         Real mDisplacement;
00177                         bool mEnableDistance;
00178 
00179                 public:
00181                         VoronoiModule () :
00182                                         mFrequency(1.0), mSeed(0), mDisplacement(1.0), mEnableDistance(false) {}
00183 
00185                         void setFrequency (Real v)
00186                         {
00187                                 mFrequency = v;
00188                         }
00190                         Real getFrequency () const
00191                         {
00192                                 return mFrequency;
00193                         }
00195                         void setSeed (int v)
00196                         {
00197                                 mSeed = v;
00198                         }
00200                         int getSeed () const
00201                         {
00202                                 return mSeed;
00203                         }
00205                         void setDisplacement (Real v)
00206                         {
00207                                 mDisplacement = v;
00208                         }
00210                         Real getDisplacement () const
00211                         {
00212                                 return mDisplacement;
00213                         }
00215                         void setEnableDistance (bool v=true)
00216                         {
00217                                 mEnableDistance = v;
00218                         }
00220                         bool isDistanceEnabled () const
00221                         {
00222                                 return mEnableDistance;
00223                         }
00225                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00226                         {
00227                                 NoiseThrowNotImplementedException;
00228                         }
00230                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00231                         {
00232                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new VoronoiElement2D(mFrequency, mSeed+pipe->getSeed(), mDisplacement, mEnableDistance));
00233                         }
00235                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00236                         {
00237                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new VoronoiElement3D(mFrequency, mSeed+pipe->getSeed(), mDisplacement, mEnableDistance));
00238                         }
00240                         ModuleTypeId getType() const { return MODULE_VORONOI; }
00241 #if NOISEPP_ENABLE_UTILS
00243                         virtual void write (utils::OutStream &stream) const;
00245                         virtual void read (utils::InStream &stream);
00246 #endif
00247         };
